name: Andy Mckay
biography: Andy’s has worked very actively in the Open Source community, focusing on web application development using languages such as Django, Python, Plone, Zope and more. He was a key contributor to the Plone development community including contributing to the source code, assisting on the Plone Foundation board, authoring the first book on Plone, “The Definitive Guide to Plone”, creating local user groups, giving training, speaking at conferences and mentoring.
